name: MEC Pump Sack
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Blowing up a whole sleeping pad is enough to make anyone lightheaded. Make your life a little easier by using the Pump Sack to inflate your MEC VectAir pad. Save your breath for the race to the lake. Bonus: it doubles as a lightweight, water-resistant stuff sack for your sleeping bag or extra layers.Made of lightweight 30-denier ripstop polyester.Internal TPU laminate and fully taped seams create a waterproof interior, although it is not designed for submersion.Roll-top closure buckles can be closed at the top or attached to the side buckles to cinch down the bag.Compatible with MEC VectAir sleeping pad valves or other 21mm valves.Maximum volume is 21L.
